title: Darkest Hour
description: The Eternal Conflict between the Light and the Dark once again blackens the skies and blights the land. On one the Tuatha De Danaan, golden-skinned and beautiful, filled with the might of the angels. On the the Fomorii, monstrous devils hellbent on destroying all human existence. In the five Brothers and Sisters of Dragons, determined to use the strange power that binds them to the land in a last, desperate attempt to save the human race.
author: Mark Chadbourn
